name: RAW POWER prototype
description:
Manage your planet and dont die to pollution,

if the top bar reaches 100 you lose

if you run out of money you lose

you lose money if you dont fulfill the energy requirements (left bar)

Dont press exit before you are done

Controls:

left mouse button click repair broken building

right mouse button click building to delete

drag middle mouse button to rotate planet

click buttons to choose building, hover over planet where you wish to place building, left mouse button to build

Buildings that are broken down will turn red

Please send us a screenshot of you playing the game :D

- The Missing Orange
